Package pulse.problem.statements

Class LinearisedProblem

  • java.lang.Object
    • pulse.util.UpwardsNavigable
      • pulse.util.Accessible
        • pulse.util.PropertyHolder
          • pulse.problem.statements.Problem
            • pulse.problem.statements.LinearisedProblem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Describable, Reflexive, SaveableCategory
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DiathermicMaterialProblem, TranslucentMaterialProblem
    public class LinearisedProblem
extends Problem
    The simplest problem statement supported in PULsE, which is formulated in the dimensionless form and with linearised boundary conditions.
